components.name: Topdoc Quiet Button Component

modifiers..is-active: Simulates active state for a quiet button on touch interfaces

components.markup: Button Button Button

title: Button
minified: .topcoat-button,.topcoat-button--cta,.topcoat-button--large,.topcoat-button--large--cta,.topcoat-button--large--quiet,.topcoat-button--quiet{position:relative;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-background-clip:padding;-moz-background-clip:padding;background-clip:padding-box;padding:0;margin:0;font:inherit;color:inherit;background:0 0;border:none;cursor:default;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;user-select:none;-o-text-overflow:ellipsis;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;padding:0 1.16rem;font-size:12px;line-height:2rem;letter-spacing:1px;color:#c6c8c8;text-shadow:0 -1px rgba(0,0,0,.69);vertical-align:top;background-color:#595b5b;-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,.12);box-shadow:inset 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,.12);border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.36);-webkit-border-radius:3px;border-radius:3px}.topcoat-button--large.is-active,.topcoat-button--large:active,.topcoat-button.is-active,.topcoat-button:active{background-color:#404141;-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0 1px rgba(0,0,0,.18);box-shadow:inset 0 1px rgba(0,0,0,.18)}.topcoat-button.is-disabled,.topcoat-button:disabled{opacity:.3;cursor:default;pointer-events:none}.topcoat-button--quiet{background:0 0;border:1px solid transparent;-webkit-box-shadow:none;box-shadow:none}.topcoat-button--large--quiet.is-active,.topcoat-button--large--quiet:active,.topcoat-button--quiet.is-active,.topcoat-button--quiet:active{color:#c6c8c8;text-shadow:0 -1px rgba(0,0,0,.69);background-color:#404141;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.36);-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0 1px rgba(0,0,0,.18);box-shadow:inset 0 1px rgba(0,0,0,.18)}.topcoat-button--quiet.is-disabled,.topcoat-button--quiet:disabled{opacity:.3;cursor:default;pointer-events:none}
